snippet.title: Überläufer Updated Spring 2021 Trailer
snippet.description:
Überläufer is a virtual reality game coming to PCVR headsets in Fall 2021.

You are a Wehrmacht solider in 1940 who opposed the Third Reich. Incarcerated by the SS, you must escape the procedurally-generated dungeon with the assistance of the German resistance. Use environmental clues to avoid detection by guards and gather the items you need to escape. Every playthrough is different.  Built for VR.

Official Website: www.uberlaufer.com

#indiegame #vr #virtualreality #roguelike
